page.title: 10Public Transport
page.content: Weardale Bus Services operate the bus services in this area. There are four main routes:- Stanhope to Crook, Stanhope to Bishop Auckland,and Stanhope to Cowshill which operate daily, and Stanhope to Newcastle which operates on Wednesday and Saturday only. All the services operate from the Matket Place in Stanhope. We surveyed 95 families in the area to find out how often they used the buses. 19 said daily,9 weekly, 5 monthly,50 seldom and 12 never. Drivers collect the fares as you get on the bus as there are no conductors. There are 4 school buses which pick up children in the area to take them to the Comprehensive School at Wolsingham There are no rail services in the area.
